name: Against Gravity
description:
Bepary Games

Against Gravity

Game information/description

Fight against gravity to go to the next level. It is not going to be easy, you'll have to survive and do the impossible.

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • WASD to change gravity direction.

System requirements:

Windows:

  • Windows Xp or above
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics
  • 1GHz CPU

Mac OS X:

  • Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • 1GB RAM
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Ubuntu:

  • Ubuntu 14 or above
  • OpenGL-capable graphics card with valid driver
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Note: this game runs only on Windows but you can use Wine to use this game on other platforms.

Some of the resources in this game are from other publishers. This game is for educational purposese only.
